content: [Phase 1] Add login view HTML with tabs (Login | Registro) to index.html
[Phase 1] Add logout button to sidebar in index.html
[Phase 2] Add CSS styles for login view, tabs, and logout button to styles.css
[Phase 3] Add auth state and functions (checkAuth, handleLogin, handleRegister, handleLogout, loadLogin) to app.js
[Phase 3] Update navigate(), loadView(), and init() functions in app.js
Test login flow with seed user (admin/Admin2026!)
